title: Sexylizzy2813
author: Sexylizzy2813
content: Our health sector nah place wey I been think say go really help sick dying piple for this our contri but when e vex me pass nah when them make me lose person wey I no fit forget even if I dy inside hurri. How doctors go see person wey dy die or wey wan die the first thing to ask nah moni, go to the cashier and pay this sum of amount like say them use moni take create the person, I see no reason why moni go come first before human being life.And if you pay the moni and them see say them no fit revive (abeg sorry I no know how I take speak that English) I mean if them no fit keep that sick person alive nah to ask you to go do another thing wey concern moni make e be say them collect you finish. When my fada die for one hospita for PH here, them know say no way oxygen just dy do off and on like NEPA light wey no get current but them still collect 20k even send my broda to wear gloves, them make the guy become doctor by force.Another annoying thing be say the oxygen wey them get no even fit hold person life till the next day, I no understand if nah gas them refill half way. E get some hospita wey you go enter but when you dy come back nah maleria you go carry come back. Who I wan blame for so many lives wey don kick pocket all in the name of feeling less concern by doctors and nurses? Becos I no go say nah government oh becos government no go say as doctor make you first collect moni before you treat person wey him mata serious pass to change old notes or to even get fuel, nah life first and doctors get plenty explanation to give us why them choose moni over life.I no wan talk again, make una tell us una experience, why all these things dy happen for hospita and who we fit hold say nai be the cos, na government or the doctors... Make una chuk mouth...

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Judging by the situation we found ourselves in Nigeria, I will like to limit my reply to the professionalism of doctors and other healthcare practitioners in the country and shy away from the availability of resources needed to dispense their services because it's not their fault.I'm particular about the experts in the field because their actions say many of them are just there for the money and job security, not for professionalism and care for life. I say this based on experience, there is too much lackadaisical attitude of our doctors especially, yet a few are passionate about the job and will do anything to save lives.A lot of lives are being lost daily due to the negligence of doctors, and many view life as worthless to them. But you will see them protesting only on little matters since they have lost the core value of the profession.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: You are absolutely correct mate. I wonder if these set of medical practitioners do have conscience at all, if trulyÂ  they have passion for the job they are doing or they are just there for the money and job security just as OP has said. I wonder if they really do have sober reflection of their ill act everyday after their activities at all. I am beginning to see them as heartless and careless about human life because their approach to victims upon admitting them to their various hospital is something else. You can imagine a doctor telling you to make deposit of money before they touch a patient in the hospital and meanwhile the patient is at the point of death and needs utmost medical attention. People have lost their loved onesÂ  as a result of this nonchalant attitude of medical doctors and it is very bad thatÂ  our nation is in such a state where the health sector no longer cares about life and this has made the health workers too not to care about their patient anymore only those who give them extra tip that they show concern. It has gotten so bad now that the health system is deteriorating. No wonder our Political class and the power that be are all flying abroad for their medicals. The worst of it all is that allowance due, salary increment, promotion and recognition due the health workers are not accorded them so hence their actions and inaction's. It is a pity that our health sector has gotten to this point of medical criticality and callousness.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: This problems dey happen mostly in government hospitals and not Private hospital, though I been get one doctor friend like that wey dey always help people wey Dem rush come hospital, but wen Dem don receive treatment finish, for Dem to pay for the drugs and injections used on Dem go be problem, say sometimes when DemÂ  don delay the payment, the hospital dey deduct the money from him(doctor) monthly salary, say now anybody wey Dem carry come, if na him dey on duty say Dem must make deposit before him go start treatments, so I feel say some of this hospitals dey react based on how other patients don treat dem, But e no mean say Dem no go help people wey dey at the point of death, to me the way Dem for dey do am be say, if Dem bring patient come hospital, and money no dey with the patient or his/her people to pay, make the doctors no worry make Dem treat the patient first, but Make this patient or his/her sign a written agreement or something like under taking say en go surely pay after treatments..My people na so I see am oo

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Honestly the Hospitals in Nigeria and even the mode of health care in the country is an embarrassment, itâ€™s fast becoming risky to actually seek medical care for Nigeria.I Dey the medical line and from my experience I fit tell you first hand that the health sector don collapse. The hospital this days are under staffed, poor equipment, no government support and it keeps getting worse, that why we need to vote wisely this year.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: OurÂ  health institution useless and good for nothing. Even the traditional health institution and native doctors don better pass the English health institutions for we country. As you see so some people don begin patronize the traditional herbal health institution pass the oyibo own because of the state affairs wey dey go on there. The rate at which people dey die for you their don dey alarming. The doctors and nurses no get love for human life at all. Them no send you, them no see you all wetin Dem dey after na their pocket and their Belle. Of you dey die e no concern them, Dem go even tell you to make deposit first before them go touch your perso. Them no get joy at all. The situation dry very alarming and worrisome. Our government too no send at all as e be say Dem dey go abroad go do their medical checkup so that one no concern them wether the health sector good or not Dem no want to know.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: No be only naija. Even for UK, them dey complain about the state of their health sector. For here, public hospitals no dey try at all, the doctors and health workers there no even send you if you dey die or not. Last year I was in and out of the hospital, general hospital in Warri omo these people stress me. The doctors dey refer me to their own private hospital for treatment, at first I refuse because I know say the private hospital go dey expensive but when I see say them nor dey give me face. Nobody tell me before I go private hospital, even thoughÂ  the cost dey higher the kind attention them go give you dey way better than public hospital.

I dey see situation when people abandoned their family members for hospital and now imagine in a situation when dey never pay doctors, who go come take care of those bills and how the doctors go take feed their family. We no get a better health insurance wey be say the government fit dey pay for every sick person and dey collect the money small small from their salary.Something make we no dey too look outside dey think say foreigners own better because even dem no dey treat people if dem no get health insurance. I understand say some doctor own bad as na pure wickedness dem dey do. If dey see person for critical condition, atleast dem fir try stabilized the person before dem begin dey ask for bills to continue and no be dis one wey dem no go touch the person at all. And another thing wey dey worry me na when gun wound come and dem dey request police report abi wetin I no understand before dem fit operate the person. Na dat particular one dey vex me die.

Because to get quality healthcare, dey very expensive anywhere in the world. So i believe say na em makeÂ  governments all over the world dey build them own hospitals. I de reason say for developed countries, people fit to go for government hospital and get better healthcare treatment. I know say e dey important to pay for their services, because dem get family to feed too. But the profession wey dem choose demand say make dem go put human life first before money.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: E no dey advicable say doctors go dey first dey ask for money before attending to patient wey need help for hospital or at a dieing state, dem supposed attend to Dem before asking for money or something, but in another run too, some persons wey their people wey doctor don help for hospital no dey try at all when doctors don attend to their people finish, plenty of Dem no dey gree pay again and e dey bring issues, I get one doctor friend like that wey dey always help people like that but en come stop say because plenty people no dey keep their promises when dem don treat their people finish and na him go come dey pay from him salary, and plenty of Dem wey be say their person come Kuku die in the process, him wey be doctor no go even get mind to ask Dem for money for treatments, na him go still carry him own salary pay at last, so nai make en stop to treat people without a deposit..Me shall come get small understanding with am shall, nai make person just need to pray to get money incase we find ourselves in any condition wey money dey needed urgently, so we can pay and have peace at last...

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: The death of a love is one of the most painful thing that can ever happen to any individual, most especially at a tender age. So i'm very sorry say you have to pass through what I passed through early 2019 when my mumsy also died in the hands of all this our "I don't care" Port Harcourt doctors, most especially for "B.M.H" wey my mumsy been pass-away after we got transferred from "Save A Life Hospital" when we noticed her health was getting worse and yet hospital bills running into multiple 5 figures. And we thought maybe going to government hospital go dey cheaper not knowing say na death we dey go meet due to doctors love for money first and carelessness.
